home.title: Your toolkit to dive into C++ easily
home.easyDescription: With c3pm, start your cross-platform project with 0 configuration. It has never been so simple!
home.trivialDescription: c3pm will manage the dependencies for you! No more hours spent installing a simple library: one command and youâ€™re good to go!
home.sharingDescription: c3pm is, before all, a package manager. You can share a reusable piece of code with the entire community!
